member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamCountLimit
member.summary: The absolute maximum amount of teams there can be in the catalog

member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamCount
member.summary: How many teams there are in total, this should be used instead of TeamIndex.Count wherever possible as this accounts for modded teams

member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.ModdedTeamCountLimit
member.summary: The absolute maximum amount of modded teams there can be in the catalog

member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.ModdedTeamCount
member.summary: How many modded teams that have been registered

member.name: M:R2API.TeamsAPI.IsModdedTeam(RoR2.TeamIndex)
member.summary: Determines if a is a valid modded team

member.name: M:R2API.TeamsAPI.IsValidTeam(RoR2.TeamIndex)
member.summary: Determines if a is valid, prefer to use this instead of comparing with

member.name: M:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamsEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates all registered teams, prefer to use this over iterating through [0 .. ) yourself
member.returns: An enumerable for all registered team indices
member.remarks: Teams are returned in order, vanilla teams first [ .. ) then modded teams, in the order they were registered.

member.name: M:R2API.TeamsAPI.RegisterTeam(RoR2.TeamDef,R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamBehavior)
member.summary: Registers a new team to the catalog and returns it's
member.remarks: If a team has already been added with the same name configured in , then the previously registered team's will be returned.
member.param: Additional configuration not covered by the
member.returns: The of the newly added team, or if the team limit has been reached.
member.exception: This method is called after game initialization has finished.

member.name: M:R2API.TeamsAPI.GetTeamBehavior(RoR2.TeamIndex)
member.summary: Gets the instance of a modded team
member.returns: The instance of the modded team associated with , or if is a vanilla team or outside the bounds of modded teams

member.name: T:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamBehavior
member.summary: Determines how a team should behave and interact with the game.
member.remarks: Properties that support changing mid-game are marked , inherit this class to implement custom behavior for them.

member.summary: The internal name of this team, used in place of an enum string representation

member.summary: What vanilla team's behavior this team should be based on

member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamBehavior.TeamLayer
member.summary: The layer used by members of this team, returned by for the TeamIndex assigned to this team

member.name: P:R2API.TeamsAPI.TeamBehavior.TeamFakeLayer
